SimSite3D::atom_info_t

my_float_t vdw_radius
 Van der Waals radius.

Detailed Description

The Van der Waals radii of a number of metals are the recommended values given in table 12 of S. S. Batsanov, "Van der Waals radii of elements from the data of structural inorganic chemistry", Russian Chemical Bulletin, V. 44, 1995.
